title: (x) The Guide to Getting In - ITC Officina Serif, Filosofia {Marc O, D Riley, Ben Shaykin}
content:
What’s the font in The Guide to Getting In? Can’t put my finger on it; I really like it. Image is here!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/GettingIN0002_4123.jpg)
author: fathairyape

comments.content:
Oops, it’s \*not\* FF Zine Slab, but rather Officina Serif Bold

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-officina-serif/officina-serif-itc-bold/](http://web.archive.org/web/20061130181858/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-officina-serif/officina-serif-itc-bold/)
